main.docTitle: Sewage Services Trading FundResolution of the Legislative Council
main.text: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council under sections 3, 4 and 6 of the Trading Funds Ordinance (Cap. 430) on 9 March 1994.
main.leadIn: Resolved that with effect from 11 March 1994—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: on the recommendation of the Financial Secretary, the Sewage Services Trading Fund (the trading fund) shall be established to manage and account for the operation of the government service of sewage services;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the services to be provided under the trading fund shall be those specified in Schedule 1;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the assets set out in Schedule 2 shall be appropriated to the trading fund;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: unless otherwise provided in a subsequent resolution in respect of the trading fund, the net value of the assets appropriated to the trading fund shall be shown in the Capital Investment Fund as a contribution of trading fund capital.

editorialNote.content: For closure of the Sewage Services Trading Fund, please see the relevant Resolution of the Provisional Legislative Council (Cap. 430 sub. leg. I).

schedule.name: sch1
schedule.heading: Services to be Provided by the Trading Fund

section.name: s1
section.leadIn: During the period from 11 March 1994 until the date of the introduction of a scheme of charging for sewage services, design and construction of the following capital projects forming part of the “High Priority Programme of the Sewage Strategy”—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: Strategic Sewage Disposal Scheme Stage I;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: Tsuen Wan/Kwai Tsing Sewerage Master Plan;

paragraph.name: d
f
paragraph.content: Chai Wan and Shau Kei Wan Sewerage Master Plan;

paragraph.name: g
paragraph.content: Tseung Kwan O Sewerage Master Plan.

section.name: s2
section.leadIn: On and after the date of the introduction of a scheme of charging for sewage services—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: design and construction of capital projects of the “High Priority Programme of the Sewage Strategy” and other sewage services projects;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: maintenance and operation of public sewerage systems and sewage disposal facilities;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: billing and collection of charges for sewage services levied in accordance with an Ordinance.
